name: Goblin Quest: Escape!
description: Goblin Quest: Escape! is an award-winning action-packed dungeon crawler, action-rpg and reverse tower defense hybrid from BotBite Industries.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11-compatible with 2 GB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
